title: WB I-64 near Grand reopened after deadly shooting on highway
content: Police are investigating a fatal shooting that happened on westbound I-64 Saturday that left one dead.   Emergency crews arrived on scene 2:30 p.m. just past Grand Ave and quickly shut down all lanes of traffic.  Upon arrival, officers found a 30-year-old man dead inside his car with a gunshot wound to the chest, police say.  Ambulances leaving scene of shooting on WB I-64. Homicide detectives still combing the scene of shooting. WB I-64 is now CLOSED to through traffic. pic.twitter.com/aAJJENZa72  — Ashli Lincoln KMOV (@AshliLincoln) June 2, 2018   Just past 4:30 p.m., crews reopened all lanes to the public.   No additional information has been released.   This is a developing story, News 4 will update as more information is available.
